file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
    title: perfmon
    version: 0.1.0
servers:
    - url: 'http://159.89.47.233'
    - url: 'http://localhost'
paths:
    /:
        post:
            description: 'Add a finished job'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                                - version
                                - name
                                - measurement
                                - timestamp
                                - value
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
                                version:
                                    type: string
                                attributes:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                        type: string
                                name:
                                    type: string
                                measurement:
                                    type: string
                                timestamp:
                                    type: string
                                    format: date-time
                                value:
                                    type: integer
                                    minimum: 1
            responses:
                '201':
                    description: Created
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request'
                '409':
                    description: 'Resource Already Exists'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /products:
        get:
            description: 'Returns all available products'
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    products:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: string
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /versions:
        get:
            description: 'Returns all the versions for the specific product'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    versions:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: string
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /attributes:
        get:
            description: 'Returns all the attributes for the specific product and version'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                                - version
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
                                version:
                                    type: string
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    attributes:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: string
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /names:
        get:
            description: 'Returns all the names for the specific product, version and attributes'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                                - version
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
                                version:
                                    type: string
                                attributes:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                        type: string
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    names:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: string
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /measurements:
        get:
            description: 'Returns all the measurements for the specific product, version, attributes and name'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                                - version
                                - name
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
                                version:
                                    type: string
                                attributes:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                        type: string
                                name:
                                    type: string
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    measurements:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: string
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
    /chart:
        get:
            description: 'Returns a time series of values for the specific product, version, attributes, name, measurement and time period'
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            required:
                                - product
                                - version
                                - name
                                - measurement
                                - lbound
                                - rbound
                            properties:
                                product:
                                    type: string
                                version:
                                    type: string
                                attributes:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                        type: string
                                name:
                                    type: string
                                measurement:
                                    type: string
                                lbound:
                                    type: string
                                    format: date-time
                                rbound:
                                    type: string
                                    format: date-time
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    data:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: object
                                            properties:
                                                x:
                                                    type: string
                                                    format: date-time
                                                y:
                                                    type: integer
                '400':
                    description: 'Bad Request / Not enough attributes provided!'
                '500':
                    description: 'Internal Server Error'
